Package com.atakmap.android.hierarchy

Class HierarchyListUserSelect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.hierarchy.HierarchyListFilter
      • com.atakmap.android.hierarchy.HierarchyListUserSelect
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncListUserSelect, FeatureEditListUserSelect, HashtagDeleteSelect, HashtagListUserSelect, HierarchyListUserFileSelect, HierarchyListUserGeoFence, HierarchyListUserMissionPackage
    public abstract class HierarchyListUserSelect
extends HierarchyListFilter
    Interface to add functionality to the Hierarchy List Tool e.g. delete all items selected by user.

    Note, to be instantiated via Reflection by the HierarchyListReceiver, implementations must implement a constructor with signature: ctor(Context, String)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  HierarchyListUserSelect.ButtonMode
      ALWAYS_VISIBLE Button always visible VISIBLE_WHEN_SELECTED Button visible when at least one item is selected

      • getTag

      • getActions

        public long getActions()
        Returns the action(s) that may be performed by the selection handler. The value returned by this method will be used when building the hierarchy lists via MapOverlay.getListModel(android.widget.BaseAdapter, long, com.atakmap.android.hierarchy.HierarchyListItem.Sort).
        Returns:
        A bitwise-OR of one of more of the ACTION_xxx flags specified in Actions.

      • isExternalUsageSupported

        public boolean isExternalUsageSupported()
        Whether or not this selector can be used externally by other tools If this selector is only used for a specific workflow then leave this as false Otherwise if you want the selector to show up under Overlay Manager > Multi Select, return true
        Returns:
        True if this selector can be used externally

      • acceptRootList

        public boolean acceptRootList()
        Whether to show this select handler as a multi-select option when the user is on the root list of Overlay Manager. The root list is not processed by the usual filtering methods to preserve legacy behavior, so this method handles the filtering.

        Note: This is only used when isExternalUsageSupported() is set to true.

        Returns:
        True to show this select handler as a multi-select option on the root list

      • getIcon

        public android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getIcon()

        Returns:
        Icon drawable
